verbs.description: If [ARG0: you] [V: want] [ARG1: a perfect example of why his attorneys do n’t want him to testify for Robert Mueller] , listen to Trump talking to reporters after a meeting with Kim Jong - Un ’s chief deputy at the White House , specifically when asked about a letter he delivered from Kim himself .
